## isAttackedBy() function

Checks if a target square is attacked by a square for a board state, and uses the current turn as the attacking color.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function isAttackedBy(state: Readonly<BoardState>, targetSquare: number, attackerSquare: number): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  state | Readonly&lt;[BoardState](./chess.ts.boardstate.md)<!-- -->&gt; | Board state |
|  targetSquare | number | Target square |
|  attackerSquare | number | Attacker square |

**Returns:**

boolean
